cluster_relations.rel_desc: These studies quantify what fraction of communication is conveyed via body language.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: The subject study provides a numerical estimate (e.g., fraction or percentage) of the proportion associated with the object within a broader process or outcome.
